name: UnloadTabs
author: Niklas Gollenstede
description: Unload your tabs to free resources and prevents them from loading unintentionally

prevLoadedTab.description: Switch to the previous loaded Tab

prevLoadedTab_1.description: Switch to the previous loaded Tab (alternative)

nextLoadedTab.description: Switch to the next loaded Tab

nextLoadedTab_1.description: Switch to the next loaded Tab (alternative)
